The channels are surrounded by bpe or rctt-tpcb ligands and occupied by DMF molecules.ligands1H NMR spectrumhydrochloric acidsolventTGAsorptionsorptionadsorption24sorptionCO2 adsorption isotherms of PCP 1′ (filled circles) and 2′ (open triangles) at 195 K. Stp is standard temperature and pressure.adsorptionadsorptionX-ray analysissorption423433711124823436126474940482910411294949175025146† Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. CCDC 867153 and 867154. For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c2cc31083jcrystallographic data‡ Synthesis of single crystals of PCP 1: On a DMF solution (2 mL) of Zn(NO3)·6H2O (11.9 mg, 0.04 mmol) was carefully layered a MeOH solution (2 mL) of H2moip (7.8 mg, 0.04 mmol) and bpe (7.3 mg, 0.04 mmol). Block-shaped crystals were obtained in a few days. Elemental analysis calcd. for C24H23N3O6Zn (1): C, 55.99; H, 4.50; N, 8.16%; found: C, 55.20; H, 4.37; N, 8.12%. X-ray diffraction data collection for 1 and 2: A single crystal of 1 was mounted on a goniometer using a loop. Intensity data were collected at 93 K on a RIGAKU Saturn 70 CCD system with a VariMax Mo Optic and confocal monochromator. After the collection of the data for 1, the crystal was irradiated with an ultra-high pressure Hg lamp for 20 min at 93 K, then the X-ray diffraction images of the photoirradiated sample were collected and the structure of 2 was determined.Crystallographic data for PCP 1 and 2: The SQUEEZE command25 in PLATON was used in the structure refinement for PCP 1. Crystal data for PCP 1. C21H16N2O5Zn, M = 441.75, triclinic, P (No. 2), a = 9.756(2), b = 10.106(3), c = 12.894(3) Å, α = 89.221(13), β = 72.476(10), γ = 71.294(9)°, V = 1143.3(5) Å3, Z = 2, T = 93 K, μ = 11.05 cm−1, 9073 reflections measured, 4823 unique (Rint = 0.0359), R1 = 0.0488 (I > 2σ(I)), wR2 = 0.1493 (all reflections), GOF = 0.997. CCDC 867153. Crystal data for PCP 2: C24H23N3O6Zn, M = 514.84, triclinic, P (No. 2), a = 9.3209(11), b = 10.204(2), c = 13.366(2) Å, α = 83.037(7), β = 70.710(6), γ = 72.124(6)°, V = 1141.7(3) Å3, Z = 2, T = 93 K, μ = 11.22 cm−1, 8710 reflections measured, 4552 unique (Rint = 0.0279), R1 = 0.0610, wR2 = 0.1737 (I > 2σ(I)), GOF = 1.448. CCDC 867154.

† Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. CCDC 867153 and 867154. For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c2cc31083j

crystallographic data

‡ Synthesis of single crystals of PCP 1: On a DMF solution (2 mL) of Zn(NO3)⋅6H2O (11.9 mg, 0.04 mmol) was carefully layered a MeOH solution (2 mL) of H2moip (7.8 mg, 0.04 mmol) and bpe (7.3 mg, 0.04 mmol). Block-shaped crystals were obtained in a few days. Elemental analysis calcd. for C24H23N3O6Zn (1): C, 55.99; H, 4.50; N, 8.16%; found: C, 55.20; H, 4.37; N, 8.12%. X-ray diffraction data collection for 1 and 2: A single crystal of 1 was mounted on a goniometer using a loop. Intensity data were collected at 93 K on a RIGAKU Saturn 70 CCD system with a VariMax Mo Optic and confocal monochromator. After the collection of the data for 1, the crystal was irradiated with an ultra-high pressure Hg lamp for 20 min at 93 K, then the X-ray diffraction images of the photoirradiated sample were collected and the structure of 2 was determined.Crystallographic data for PCP 1 and 2: The SQUEEZE command25 in PLATON was used in the structure refinement for PCP 1. Crystal data for PCP 1. C21H16N2O5Zn, M = 441.75, triclinic, P (No. 2), a = 9.756(2), b = 10.106(3), c = 12.894(3) Å, α = 89.221(13), β = 72.476(10), γ = 71.294(9)°, V = 1143.3(5) Å3, Z = 2, T = 93 K, μ = 11.05 cm-1, 9073 reflections measured, 4823 unique (Rint = 0.0359), R1 = 0.0488 (I > 2σ(I)), wR2 = 0.1493 (all reflections), GOF = 0.997. CCDC 867153. Crystal data for PCP 2: C24H23N3O6Zn, M = 514.84, triclinic, P (No. 2), a = 9.3209(11), b = 10.204(2), c = 13.366(2) Å, α = 83.037(7), β = 70.710(6), γ = 72.124(6)°, V = 1141.7(3) Å3, Z = 2, T = 93 K, μ = 11.22 cm-1, 8710 reflections measured, 4552 unique (Rint = 0.0279), R1 = 0.0610, wR2 = 0.1737 (I > 2σ(I)), GOF = 1.448. CCDC 867154.
